post.title: MiniUPnPd copyIPv6IfDifferent NULL pointer dereference
post.content:
Summary

Denial Of Service in MiniUPnPd due to a NULL pointer dereference in pcpserver.c

Component

MiniUPnP

Affected versions

MiniUPnP (,2.1], fixed in 2.2.0

Description

It was discovered that MiniUPnPd did not properly parse certain PCP requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause MiniUPnPd to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

PoC

No PoC is supplied for this issue

Vulnerability Mitigations

No vulnerability mitigations are supplied for this issue

References

NVD

NVD
post.description: CVE-2019-12111 High severity. Denial Of Service in MiniUPnPd due to a NULL pointer dereference in pcpserver.c
